utterances.transcript: ... and that's the story of the dreidle. Now, some people trace the Christmas tree back to the Egyptians, who used to bring green palm branches into their huts on the shortest day of the year, symbolising life's triumph over death. And that was like 4000 years ago.

utterances.transcript: Oh, hey guys!
caption: oh hi guys

utterances.transcript: Y'know, birds have a very good sense of direction, and I thought maybe they could help us find where the presents are hidden.
caption: birds have a very good sense of direction i thought maybe they could help us find the presents

utterances.transcript: Yes, if the presents are hidden south for the winter.
caption: yes if the presents are hidden south for the winter

utterances.transcript: Or we could just follow your clever jokes – any ideas? No! Didn't think so! Okay, c'mon guys, show us where the presents are!
caption: or we could just follow your clever jokes any ideas didn t think so come on show us where the presents are

utterances.transcript: Oh, the duck seems to think that Monica got me garbage! Hmm, I wonder what I could get Monica that's as good as garbage?
caption: the duck seems to think that monica got me garbage i wonder what i could get monica that s as good as garbage

utterances.transcript: Hmm, how about my azzz?
caption: hmm how about my az

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Rachel sits on the window seat, and knocks against it)

utterances.transcript: Hey, this is hollow.
caption: hey this is hollow

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: This bench, it's hollow! I can't believe I never knew that! Oh, the presents!!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: This bench, it's hollow! I can't believe I never knew that! (She pushes all the pillows off it and opens it up) Oh, the presents!!!
caption: this bench it s hollow i can t believe i never knew that oh the presents

utterances.transcript: No, don't look directly at them!
caption: don t look directly at them

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Alright, no, we could look at them!
caption: all right no we could look at them

utterances.transcript: Oh, this one's for me!
caption: this one s for me

utterances.transcript: Oh, this one's for Chandler. Here.
caption: this one s for chandler here

utterances.transcript: Oh great!
And the big one's for me!
caption: and the big one s for me

utterances.transcript: Ooh, let's open them!
caption: oh let s open them

utterances.transcript: Okay! Okay! Okay!
Hee hee!
Wait, we can't do this.
caption: wait a minute we can t do this

utterances.transcript: Why?
caption: why

utterances.transcript: I don't wanna know what Monica got me. Y'know? I mean, look, I'm sure she worked really hard at getting you a present, and wanting to surprise me, and you guys are gonna ruin that, and I, look we have to put these back, this is not what Christmas is about.
caption: i don t want to know what monica got me i m sure she worked hard at getting it and wanting to surprise me and you guys are gonna ruin that we have to put them back this isn t what christmas is about

utterances.transcript: Whatever Linus, I'm opening mine.
caption: whatever linus i m opening mine

utterances.transcript: Nobody is opening anything ok? Look, I don't know about you guys, but I wanna see the look on Monica's face when I give her my present, and I'm sure she wants to see the look on my face when I get mine. So please, please, can we just, can we put them back?
caption: i want to see the look on her face when i give her my present i m sure she wants to see the look on my face when i get mine so please please can we just can we put them back

utterances.transcript: Will you get us better gifts?
caption: will you get us better gifts

utterances.transcript: Fine!
caption: fine

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Monica enters, and they throw the gifts behind them.)

utterances.transcript: Hey guys! You found the presents? Chandler, you let them find the presents? Great! Do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier?
caption: hey guys you found the presents you let them find the presents great do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier

utterances.transcript: That's what you got me?
caption: that s what you got me

utterances.transcript: Oh yes, I see what you mean. That look is priceless.
caption: yes i see that look is priceless

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Rachel leans over to look at him.)
[Scene: Joey and Janine's apartment, they both enter.]

utterances.transcript: Home sweet home, huh? Nice to, uh, get back to reality. Plus we know how the New Year's gonna go off. I guess there's no reason for all that Y2K panic, y'know? Anyway, g'night!
caption: home sweet home huh nice to uh get back to reality plus we uh know how the new year s gonna go off i guess there s no reason for all that y2k panic you know anyway good night

utterances.transcript: Joey.
caption: joey

utterances.transcript: Yeah?
caption: yeah

utterances.transcript: 3, 2, 1. Happy New Year.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (She takes his hands) 3, 2, 1. (She kisses him) Happy New Year.
caption: happy new year

utterances.transcript: Oh, yoii. What was that for?
caption: what was that for

utterances.transcript: Well, I don't know tonight when they yelled cut and we didn't get to kiss, I was really, really, disappointed, and I just, really wanted to kiss you
caption: tonight when they yelled cut and we didn t get to kiss i was really really disappointed and i just i just really wanted to kiss you

utterances.transcript: Really? In the moment, I really wanted to kiss you too. In the moment.
caption: really in the moment i really wanted to kiss you too in the moment

utterances.transcript: In the moment, yeah.
caption: in the moment

utterances.transcript: But only in the moment. So do ya wanna kiss again?
caption: but only in the moment so do you uh want to kiss again

utterances.transcript: Sure, New Year's Eve is only two weeks away. Can you wait?
caption: sure new year s eve is only two weeks away can you wait

utterances.transcript: No.
caption: no

utterances.transcript: Me neither.
caption: me neither
Three, two...

utterances.transcript: Joey, you don't have to count down every time we kiss.
caption: you don t have to count down every time we kiss

utterances.transcript: Uh, yeah, okay. Except I sorta felt like I needed a couple of seconds to get ready.
caption: oh okay except i sort of felt like i needed a couple seconds to get ready

utterances.transcript_with_note: (They kiss to the music of Auld Lang Syne)

plots: Janine and Joey share a kiss .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica and Chandler's apartment, everyone except Joey is there.]

utterances.transcript: We were on the platform, ready to dance the world into the new Millennium, and the guy yelled 'CUT!'
caption: we were on the platform ready to dance into the new millennium and the guy yells cut

utterances.transcript: Uh, wait, so you guys are telling me you actually did the routine from eighth grade?
caption: so you guys are telling me that you actually did the routine from eighth grade

utterances.transcript: Yeah. But of course we had to update it a little bit. Hey, by the way, great thinking about catching me!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah. But of course we had to update it a little bit. (To Ross) Hey, by the way, great thinking about catching me!
caption: yeah but of course we had to update it a little bit hey by the way quick thinking about catching me

utterances.transcript: 'Cos I was gonna say there's no way you could've done the end the way you guys did it back then!
caption: there s no way you could ve done the end the way you guys did it back then

utterances.transcript: What? We could do it!
caption: what we could do it

utterances.transcript: I don't know, I mean you were a lot bigger, I mean, stronger back then.
caption: i don t know you were a lot bigger i mean stronger back then

utterances.transcript: I can do it, okay? Come on, let's go.
utterances.transcript_with_note: I can do it, okay? Come on, let's go. (She and Ross get up)
caption: i can do it okay come on let s go come on

utterances.transcript_with_note: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 (Ross runs to be caught by Monica, but she moves out of the way)
caption: One, two, three, four.five, six, seven, eight.

utterances.transcript: I can't do it!
utterances.transcript_with_note: I can't do it! (Ross falls into Monica's room)
caption: i can t do it

utterances.transcript: Now you do that, you're on TV.
caption: now you do that you re on tv

plots: Ross , Rachael and others are practising dance .
